unnormalised: I'm expecting a parcel from Amazon, and the delivery address I gave was "H.No. 123, 2nd Floor, Near SBI Bank, Indira Nagar, Bangalore, 560038". Will the courier guy be able to find it easily? It's my first time ordering something delivered to this new address.
normalised: I am expecting a parcel from Amazon, and the delivery address I gave was "House Number one hundred and twenty three, second Floor, Near S-B-I Bank, Indira Nagar, Bangalore, five hundred and sixty thousand and thirty eight". Will the courier guy be able to find it easily? It is my first time ordering something delivered to this new address.

unnormalised: Honestly, it depends on the courier service and the delivery person. Some, like Blue Dart and FedEx, are generally pretty good with addresses. Others, like Ekart, can be hit or miss. Things that will help are making sure your phone number is correct on the order and being available to answer when they call. Also, landmarks help a lot - saying "Near SBI Bank" is good, but even better would be something unique, like "Opposite the big Hanuman temple" if that applies.
normalised: Honestly, it depends on the courier service and the delivery person. Some, like Blue Dart and FedEx, are generally pretty good with addresses. Others, like Ekart, can be hit or miss. Things that will help are making sure your phone number is correct on the order and being available to answer when they call. Also, landmarks help a lot - saying "Near S-B-I Bank" is good, but even better would be something unique, like "Opposite the big Hanuman temple" if that applies.

unnormalised: Ultimately, "H.No. 123, 2nd Floor, Near SBI Bank, Indira Nagar, Bangalore, 560038" *should* be enough for most courier companies. Just be ready to guide them if needed. You could also try adding a specific direction, for example, "Lane behind SBI Bank". Good luck with your delivery! I hope they find your place quickly.
normalised: Ultimately, "House Number one hundred and twenty three, second Floor, Near S-B-I Bank, Indira Nagar, Bangalore, five hundred and sixty thousand and thirty eight" should be enough for most courier companies. Just be ready to guide them if needed. You could also try adding a specific direction, for example, "Lane behind S-B-I Bank". Good luck with your delivery! I hope they find your place quickly.
